title: Love in Paradise
description: Love in Paradise is a romance-suspense novel that takes place in Zamzudan, a fictional country in East Africa.Mimi is dark beauty dealing with tragedy from her past. Newly graduated from one of the most prestigious universities in Zamzudan, she is also a woman  who has encased herself in a shell of isolation. Tony is a man that is much misunderstood. As the present CEO of Da-Silva Corporations, a multimillion-dollar African based company that invests in oil and real estate, Tony is a favorite subject of the tabloids.Tony and Mimi meet for the first time and fall in love.  Unfortunately, Tony has made some very powerful enemies who have planned to destroy him and Mimi. But can their love for each other conquer the threats of death facing them?
author: Lara Daniels
